org.datavec.api.transform.schema

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.api.transform.schema.Schema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SequenceSchema

    public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Schema defines the layout of tabular data. Specifically, it contains names f or each column, as well as details of types (Integer, String, Long, Double, etc).
    Type information for each column may optionally include restrictions on the allowable values for each column.

    See also: SequenceSchema

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • differences

        public java.util.List<ColumnMetaData> differences(Schema schema)
        Compute the difference in ColumnMetaData between this schema and the passed in schema. This is useful during the TransformProcess to identify what a process will do to a given Schema.
        Parameters:
        schema - the schema to compute the difference for
        Returns:
        the metadata that is different (in order) between this schema and the other schema
